title: Squeezing in a 2-D generalized oscillator
abstract: A two-dimensional generalized oscillator with time-dependent parameters is considered to study the two-mode squeezing phenomena. Specific choices of the parameters are used to determine the dispersion matrix and analytic expressions, in terms of standard hermite polynomials, of the wavefunctions and photon distributions. (to be publish in the Third Workshop on Squeezed States and Uncertainty Relations, Baltimore, USA, (August 1993))
